I'm not sure this is compatible with the proposed unification of Variables and Tensors, in that we'd want the future behavior of a plain tensor to be the same as the current behavior of a volatile=True Variable?
The global switch has worked well for Chainer but they continue to make a strong distinction between cupy.array and chainer.Variable

body:
I'm not sure this is compatible with the proposed unification of Variables and Tensors, in that we'd want the future behavior of a plain tensor to be the same as the current behavior of a `volatile=True` Variable?
The global switch has worked well for Chainer but they continue to make a strong distinction between `cupy.array` and `chainer.Variable`
